In T3Ch7, there is a need to hold the tool against the leak and then press the button.
I maybe missing some tricks but currently am not sure if the fingers have the manoeuvrability to move while also holding the tool.
 Would it be ok to hold the tool so that the button is in pressed mode all the time

 A suggestion would be to have large buttons around the grasping area like
  http://www.bazaargadgets.com/image/cache/catalog//products/electronics/instruments/Cordless6VElectricScrewdriverDrill11pcsScrewdriverBitSet-SKU183211-5-800x800.jpg
(pic has smaller buttons though , but gives you an idea)

Also how close has the repair tool need to be near the leak. Some more pictures in the tutorials page would be helpful
